_header: Bernard friend well mote thou be
Subjects: Bernard, saint; dialogues; Virgin Mary; Passion
_description: Dialogue between St Bernard and the Virgin Mary — in couplets

BodAddA268.First Lines:
Bernard frend wele mot þu beNow am I comon to spak with
                    þeþu has cald on me ful longTo onsware ye nov or I
                    gang…
BodAddA268.Note:
Names Bernard and Maria are written in abbreviated form in the margins
                    to indicate the beginnings of their speeches; last folio damaged with loss of
                    text.
